verses.text:
And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, when they \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w died|strong="H4191"\w*;

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, that he \w come|strong="H0935"\w* not at all \w times|strong="H6256"\w* into the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add* \w within|strong="H1004"\w* the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w*, which \add is\add* upon the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*; that he \w die|strong="H4191"\w* not: for I will \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* in the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* upon the \w mercy|strong="H3727"\w* seat.

\w Thus|strong="H2063"\w* shall \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place:\add* with a \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.

He shall put \w on|strong="H3847"\w* the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w linen|strong="H0906"\w* \w coat|strong="H3801"\w*, and he shall have the \w linen|strong="H0906"\w* \w breeches|strong="H4370"\w* upon his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and shall be \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* with a \w linen|strong="H0906"\w* \w girdle|strong="H0073"\w*, and with the \w linen|strong="H0906"\w* \w mitre|strong="H4701"\w* shall he be \w attired|strong="H6801"\w*: \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \add are\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*; therefore shall he \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and \add so\add* put them \w on|strong="H3847"\w*.

And he shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kids|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* his \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, which \add is\add* for \w himself|strong="H1157"\w*, and make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for himself, and for his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And he shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w goats|strong="H8163"\w*, and \w present|strong="H5975"\w* them \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add at\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall \w cast|strong="H5414"\w* \w lots|strong="H1486"\w* upon the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w goats|strong="H8163"\w*; \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* for the \w scapegoat|strong="H5799"\w*.\f + \fr 16.8 \ft scapegoat: Heb. Azazel\f*

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* the \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* upon which the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w fell|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* him \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*.\f + \fr 16.9 \ft fell: Heb. went up\f*

But the \w goat|strong="H8163"\w*, on which the \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w fell|strong="H5927"\w* to be the \w scapegoat|strong="H5799"\w*, shall be \w presented|strong="H5975"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* with him, \add and\add* to let him \w go|strong="H7971"\w* for a \w scapegoat|strong="H5799"\w* into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, which \add is\add* for himself, and shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for himself, and for his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and shall \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* which \add is\add* for himself:

And he shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w censer|strong="H4289"\w* \w full|strong="H4393"\w* of \w burning|strong="H0784"\w* \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* from off the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and his \w hands|strong="H2651"\w* \w full|strong="H4393"\w* of \w sweet|strong="H5561"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* beaten \w small|strong="H1851"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \add it\add* \w within|strong="H1004"\w* the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w*:

And he shall \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* upon the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* of the \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* may \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w* that \add is\add* upon the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, that he \w die|strong="H4191"\w* not:

And he shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, and \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* \add it\add* with his \w finger|strong="H0676"\w* upon the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w* \w eastward|strong="H6924"\w*; and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w* shall he \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* with his \w finger|strong="H0676"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*.

¶ Then shall he \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* the \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, that \add is\add* for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w within|strong="H1004"\w* the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* with that \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* as he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* with the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, and \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* it upon the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w*, and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w*:

And he shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*, because of the \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and because of their \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* in all their \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*: and so shall he \w do|strong="H6213"\w* for the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, that \w remaineth|strong="H7931"\w* among them in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of their \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w*.\f + \fr 16.16 \ft remaineth: Heb. dwelleth\f*

And there shall be no \w man|strong="H0120"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* when he \w goeth|strong="H0935"\w* in to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*, until he come \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and have made an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for himself, and for his \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, and for all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And he shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* unto the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* that \add is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for it; and shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, and of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w goat|strong="H8163"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

And he shall \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon it with his \w finger|strong="H0676"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*, and \w cleanse|strong="H2891"\w* it, and \w hallow|strong="H6942"\w* it from the \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ And when he hath made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w reconciling|strong="H3722"\w* the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*, and the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, he shall \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* the \w live|strong="H2416"\w* \w goat|strong="H8163"\w*:

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall \w lay|strong="H5564"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w live|strong="H2416"\w* \w goat|strong="H8163"\w*, and \w confess|strong="H3034"\w* over him all the \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and all their \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* in all their \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*, \w putting|strong="H5414"\w* them upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w goat|strong="H8163"\w*, and shall send \add him\add* \w away|strong="H7971"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of a \w fit|strong="H6261"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*:\f + \fr 16.21 \ft a fit…: Heb. a man of opportunity\f*

And the \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* upon him all their \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* unto a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* not \w inhabited|strong="H1509"\w*: and he shall let \w go|strong="H7971"\w* the \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.\f + \fr 16.22 \ft not…: Heb. of separation\f*

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and shall put \w off|strong="H6584"\w* the \w linen|strong="H0906"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, which he put \w on|strong="H3847"\w* when he \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*, and shall \w leave|strong="H3240"\w* them there:

And he shall \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* with \w water|strong="H4325"\w* in the \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and put \w on|strong="H3847"\w* his \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* his burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for himself, and for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
And the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* shall he \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

And he that let \w go|strong="H7971"\w* the \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* for the \w scapegoat|strong="H5799"\w* shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

And the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* \add for\add* the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and the \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* \add for\add* the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, whose \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* was brought \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to make \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*, shall \add one\add* carry \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*; and they shall \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* their \w skins|strong="H5785"\w*, and their \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and their \w dung|strong="H6569"\w*.

And he that \w burneth|strong="H8313"\w* them shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* he shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

¶ And \add this\add* shall be a \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* unto you: \add that\add* in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, on the \w tenth|strong="H6218"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, ye shall \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* your \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no \w work|strong="H4399"\w* at all, \add whether it be\add* one of your own \w country|strong="H0249"\w*, or a \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \w sojourneth|strong="H1481"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* you:

For on that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall \add the priest\add* make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for you, to \w cleanse|strong="H2891"\w* you, \add that\add* ye may be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w* from all your \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

It \add shall be\add* a \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* of \w rest|strong="H7677"\w* unto you, and ye shall \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* your \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*, by a \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, whom he shall \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w*, and whom he shall \w consecrate|strong="H4390"\w* to minister in the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w* in his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* stead, shall make the \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w*, and shall put \w on|strong="H3847"\w* the \w linen|strong="H0906"\w* \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, \add even\add* the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*:\f + \fr 16.32 \ft consecrate: Heb. fill his hand\f*

And he shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, and he shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and for the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and he shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and for all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*.

And this shall be an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* unto you, to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* for all their \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w once|strong="H0259"\w* a \w year|strong="H8141"\w*. And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
